title: The Well-hung Gun
description: A kinky western spoof featuring John Beastwood, a hero with six guns and six tentacles.While in search of a man-flu cure, Virginia Chaste trips on a nuclear powered skateboard and goes back in time to 1860. She marches into Peckerwood Springs determined to find her way back to her future.If any damn were-squid gunslinger gets in her way, Virginia's gonna shove his nearest tentacle up his own whatsit.Back to the future on acid, with a hefty dose of sex and tentacles.
author: Cari Silverwood
